title: #77: Getting Your Point Across | Benny Wills
description:
The power of communication cannot be overstated, and as we transition into a strange world where people are unable to read facial expressions, our words will carry extraordinary weight.

Benny Wills is the host of Red Pill Expo & Anarchapulco, a professional actor, part of the hilarious comedy troupe, Joy Camp, and he is back on the show to discuss how he developed a new program called Parrhesia to teach those communication skills that he honed over three decades as a working actor.
